attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government needs to re-think this smoking ban.there is very little hard evidence that passive smoking due to people smoking in pubs kills non-smoking plus my main fear is the job losses as pubs & clubs close,and not to mention the tax revenue the government will lose as where is gordon brown going to get this from....look at scotland & ireland they too disagree with this ban...the only way to go is a partial ban..smoking isnt against the law itself...where is the smokers and business right of choice, gordon brown may be a socialist but we arent, we fought world wars for freedom have some respect.please sign and pass onj

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
